isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB - TILT: 9600 AND 9700 SLEEPER AND NON-SLEEPER CABS - SERVICE ACCESSIBILITY - MAINTENANCE

svcproc.title: SERVICE ACCESSIBILITY - MAINTENANCE
svcproc.para: The tilt cab provides excellent service accessibility when the cab is in the tilted position. However, for minor service, an oil fill service door is provided below the stowage door on the cab right side and a radiator coolant access door is provided just above the front grille. On models that do not have a coolant access door above the grille, the coolant is checked at the sight glass mounted in the coolant surge tank which is mounted at the rear of the engine.

note.para: For complete details on cab RAISING/LOWERING, see Operator's Manual.
